title: `--files-from` does not list the files with leading/trailing whitespace in its name
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
`--files-from` does not list the files with leading/trailing whitespace in its name. Since `--files-from` does not support **wildcards**, there is noway to list the files with the tag.


#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
Version tested:
1.49.5
1.50.1
1.50.2

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
Os tested:
Ubuntu x64
Windows 10 x64


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Google Drive


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
`rclone lsf remote: --files-only --files-from list.txt`

`list.txt`
```
# Filenames with leading, trailing whitespace or both
 leading-whitespace-filename.txt
trailing-whitespace-filename.txt 
 leading-trailing-whitespace.txt 
```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
```
$ rclone lsf remote: --files-only --files-from list.txt -vv                                                        2019/11/25 05:40:40 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.50.2" starting with parameters ["F:\\System\\rClone\\rclone.exe" "lsf" "remote:" "--files-only" "--files-from" "list.txt" "-vv"]
2019/11/25 05:40:40 DEBUG : Using config file from "C:\\Users\\Rhaps\\.config\\rclone\\rclone.conf"
2019/11/25 05:40:42 DEBUG :  leading-trailing-whitespace.txt : Excluded
2019/11/25 05:40:42 DEBUG :  leading-whitespace-filename.txt: Excluded
2019/11/25 05:40:42 DEBUG : trailing-whitespace-filename.txt : Excluded
2019/11/25 05:40:42 DEBUG : 5 go routines active
2019/11/25 05:40:42 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.50.2" finishing with parameters ["F:\\System\\rClone\\rclone.exe" "lsf" "remote:" "--files-only" "--files-from" "list.txt" "-vv"]
```

P/S: A small visual bug. 
It seems that the `Elapsed time:` line does not include an eol character.
Os: Windows 10 x64, git-bash MINGW64 Shell, lastest rclone.

![bugreport](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27849964/69502992-c1fe8900-0f47-11ea-81fa-d1c366e1d2fa.png)
